item.description:
Mostly Singles "101 Ways to Have Fun" Party

Come join a party with great people, time to meet people individually, group get together, learn ways to have more fun in your life (around 8:30 or when most people are here), some optional games, great food. All for $10. I'll provide some food and as an option bring vegetarian entrees, appetizers, snacks or drinks. Fine to bring nothing but yourself (or a friend/s)

7:00 pm - 11:00 pm

Herb Pearce is a personality types expert, relationship counselor and coach and sponsors parties for people to meet, have fun, have great conversations and learn from Herb's wisdom.

781 648 3737
www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
item.name: Mostly Singles "101 Ways to Have Fun" Party
